chat_history.message:
Hello, I have an issue with my iPhone 13 Pro: The battery health in this iPhone is not as expected. I bought it in excellent condition, but it's only at 87%. Thank you for your help.

If the seller receives the package, they have 3 business days (5 business days for laptops and household appliances) to repair or replace the product. To request a refund if applicable, they have 2 business days.

The customer has met the following requirements for a successful return:
✔ They confirm that the device has not been opened by a third party nor damaged (through drop or water exposure).
✔ They confirm that all personal data has been removed from the device.
✔ Confirmed that the return label has arrived.
✔ Knows that all accessories and the receipt must be included with the package.
✔ Knows that the return label is valid for 14 days.

Remember: As soon as the package arrives, sellers have 3 business days (5 business days for laptops and household appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 business days to process a refund.

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Luciana Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have refunded the customer.

Regards,
CH
